p: Experiments were conducted to evaluate the growth rate of the hair roots grown in 1/2 MS, 1/2 MS + B 5 vitamins, 1/2 MS + FDP 1 μM, 1/2 MS + FDP 3 μM, 1/2 MS + B 5 vitamins + FDP 1 μM, and 1/2 MS + B 5 vitamins + FDP 3 μM. The growth index (GI) of all the four lines was measured initially and inoculated with 20 mg of FW bacteria-free HRs (3 weeks old). It was transferred into a 30 ml liquid medium in a 250 ml conical flask and maintained on a rotary shaker at 120 rpm in a dark room for 12 weeks. The in vitro grown HRs were subcultured in a fresh medium for 6 weeks to stimulate further growth of the hairs.
